gmcm.tooltip.pierre: Show the search bar when shopping at Pierre's store.
gmcm.tooltip.clint: Show the search bar when using Clint's shop menu.
gmcm.tooltip.robin: Show the search bar when talking to Robin about purchases.
gmcm.tooltip.allowedtokens: Comma/semicolon/newline-separated. If any entry matches the shop identity token (NPC name, shopId, storeContext, menu type), the search bar is enabled. Best for modded shops.
gmcm.tooltip.offsetx: Move the search bar left/right (pixels). Positive = right, negative = left.
gmcm.tooltip.offsety: Move the search bar up/down (pixels). Positive = down, negative = up.
gmcm.tooltip.focuskey: Press to toggle focus on the search box. If no results are currently shown, pressing it will also show a warning.
gmcm.tooltip.forceattach: If enabled, pressing the hotkey will attach the search bar to any ShopMenu and log its identity token for your allow-list.
hud.notattached: Search bar not attached. Enable Force Attach or add this shop to the allow-list.
